title: Taliyah is saying new voice lines on live servers.
body:
This was previously happening on the PBE and now it has come over to live servers.

I don't believe it was intentional since it wasn't in patch notes.

replies.body: I heard it as Freljord Taliyah, Taliyah also mixes them up with her normal voice lines. Making her talk 2 times at the same moment but different lines.

I have noticed this as well this week. I just got Freljord Taliyah i thought it was and issue with the extra/different voice lines unique to that skin, but noted that I had similar occurrences with the base skin as well.

two of the main new ones I've been hearing are "Fresh stones, fresh start!" and "i wish rocks could give pep-talks"

edit: "also heard rebel-rouser, that'd be a cool nickname"
"A stone can't be polished without a little friction."
also heard another one that sounded like it belongs after buying an item, but came after killing a minion, never heard it before though

Hi there Rowgard,

I'm looking into this now - do you recall when the lines occurred or what was said?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Zimberfly,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=JaEwYsey,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-03-23T17:30:00.286+0000)
>
> Hi there Rowgard,
> 
> I'm looking into this now - do you recall when the lines occurred or what was said?

The quotes happen randomly.
This was a reddit post made about the voice lines when they were on PBE showing the voice lines:
https://www.reddit.com/r/TaliyahMains/comments/82yhfi/just_found_new_voicelines_for_taliyah_on_the_pbe/

Noticed a few new lines as well.
I kind of remember one when you step onto worked ground saying, "I have to break new ground,literally." or something like that.

Just thought of the perfect mate....

https://d1o51r9qdgnnlz.cloudfront.net/items/8d9247fa-090e-4b87-b8f1-81922f052cc5.png
